item.title: Lots of Astrophysics for You!
item.description:
I wrote so much code during my PhD! Some of them were protected or cannot be shared, but some are freeeeee.

If you like astrophysics, check out some of my IDL and Python work:

  • MFits, The Astrophysical Analyzer: Package to calculate five distinct fits on the data generated from the â€¦
item.dc:creator: Marina von Steinkirch
